alert.note: Alert for Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 02 at 1:06PM MST until December 03 at 12:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 25 to 35 mph, with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until midnight MST tonight. For the High Wind Watch, from Sunday afternoon through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause isolated power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
